name: indirection
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a way of speaking or writing that avoids clearly mentioning or saying something: I tried to raise the subject in a friendly way by using indirection. Through a clever process of indirection, the novelist is able to portray a complex human character.
More examplesFewer examplesGovernments tend to operate by complicated rules of tact and indirection.She managed to indicate her dissatisfaction with my work by nuance and indirection.She is a forthright person and will not tolerate indirection.This film charms its audience with subtlety and indirection.
